recipesJson.name: Summertime
recipesJson.author: CheebaSteeba
recipesJson.description: A cool, refreshing vape. Perfect for a hot day and reminiscent of Summer.

reviews.text: Love this so much! I don’t know about the “reminiscent of Summer” part - the eucalyptus in it reminds much more of spring and fall, the seasons when I tend to need cough drops. Fuckin allergies. But I’m definitely down with it being described as a cool, refreshing vape that’s perfect for summer. Plenty flavorful without being overwhelming, decidedly floral without being at all perfumey, sweet but not too sweet, and very juicy. All these flavors work together so well to make something super easily ADV-able and even palate cleansing. Maybe even spirit-cleansing: there’s something soothing and calming about this - it tastes like the picture in that sense. I think I might need to have some of these made up at all times, especially in the summer, as it’s like an anti-anxiety breathing exercise or a yoga stretch in a bottle.  A moment of Zen in an RDA.
I really liked it at shake and vape. He was doing a great job. Nice refreshing vape juice with floral hints. thx for sharing it!
Mixed this few days after Christmas pulled it out the steep cabinet to try it and man is this good. Get a nice cool mint throat hit on the inhale and lovely floral notes on the exhale
Very mildly sweet, complex without being distracting, and floral without being overwhelming.  I'm into it.
